queries.query: project ='ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит уточнения')  AND issuetype in (Question) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит уточнения')  AND issuetype in (Question) AND status not in (Закрыт, Отменен, Closed) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Blocker ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Critical ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Minor ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Trivial ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Blocker ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Critical ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Minor ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Trivial ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменен) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority in (Critical, Blocker) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status = Заблокирован AND issuetype in (Bug) ORDER BY priority
